name: Driftless Destiny
description:
Humanity has discovered faster that light travel through a narrow corridor known as a Hyperlane, where it leads is unknown. 

The task of scouting this lanes falls to you, an expendable AI, whose inevitable destruction will come at the hands of those who inhabit this folded space. 

Go beyond your programming; scavenge and incorporate other worldly components to complete your mission and reach the other side.

-

Driftless Destiny is a side scrolling shooter incorporating ship building through random dice rolls. It is my solo developer submission for the GMTK2022 game jam.

WASD to move, Escape to exit.
